ProductSellingModelOption.name: ProductSellingModelOption
ProductSellingModelOption.description: A junction object between Product Selling Model and Product2.

Description.description: The description of the product selling model option.

DisplayName.description: The name of the product selling model option to display to customers.

Increment.description: The number of pricing term units that can be used to increase a subscription term.

IsDefault.description: Indcates the default product selling model for a product. Setting a default is optional. A product can only have one default product selling model.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view but not viewed it.

Maximum.description: The maximum number of pricing term units for a subscription term.

Minimum.description: The minimum number of pricing term units for a subscription term.

Name.description: The name of the product selling model.

Product2Id.description: The ID of the Product2 record associated with this ProductSellingModelOption record.

ProductSellingModelId.description: The ID of the ProductSellingModel record associated with this ProductSellingModelOption record.

ProrationPolicyId.description: The ID of the ProrationPolicy record associated with this ProductSellingModelOption record.
